channel.title: rust on Alexander Jophus
channel.description: Recent content in rust on Alexander Jophus

item.title: Creating a full stack web app in Rust
item.description: Intro Link to heading For those that know me or read the last blog post, you’ll know Rust has become my new favourite (I’m sorry Go, I still love you). In this post, we’ll be creating a full stack web app in Rust, using a few libraries I’ve come to love, and deploying it super super cheap. The Stack Link to heading Server - Pavex DB ORM - Diesel Server Hosting - Shuttle Website - Dioxus The Idea Link to heading Let’s start where every side project starts, the idea.

item.title: My Journey Into Rust (pt 1)
item.description: Intro Link to heading Firstly, I’m back. I’ve been away for a while, I took a career break and got a dog. I rejoined the working world in January. In that time I also began learning Rust in depth. I had dabbled with it before, but I wanted to learn it properly. I didn’t/don’t expect it to replace my love of Go, maybe I can use both in the future.
